channel.title: Surf Board
channel.description:
If request enough, I can animate and figure out how to make it a weapon to fit into an RS client as an object. I will not let it out as a weapon because it would look stupid. Alright, just tell me what you think. I did this from a picture of a surfboard my friend had. He used to live in California US, so he wanted to see what I could do with it. He said it looks about 80% like it. I personally could not get the brand name to look right into the model, since this was a low pixel camera I was working with, so I did what i could. [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/i2ljl3.jpg[/img]
NOTE - I know it doesn't have a curve to it. I forgot to do that while making it, so its basically stuck like it is.

item.title: Surf Board
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

primadude:

Needs to be rounded on the edges, and smoothed off.

If you have seen a real surf board. They are barely rounded. Some are heavier than others on the roundness. The one made this one from was barely rounded, and had little detail to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Surf Board
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Needs to be rounded on the edges, and smoothed off.

Read full topic

item.title: Surf Board
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

frogtamer101:

on the bottom make a small curve like the bottom of a boat but 10x less of a curve. thats what surfboards have

I did this from a picture of my friends. His has a small upwards curve in the board itself, but it is flat on the button with the small fin in the rear.

Read full topic

item.title: Surf Board
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:3, topic:287402”]The Colours kind of Weird.
And the Edges are a bit Sharpish

Its good though.
I might attempt one later on ;)[/quote]

The edges are meant to be sharp, it makes it more aerodynamic so it can cut thought the water quicker ^^

o_0

Read full topic

item.title: Surf Board
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Yea, the surfboard was probably not my best choice in a new model. I found out not long before I was done that there is not much i can do, besides a logo, shine, and color.
Thanks for the feedback though!

Read full topic
